title: WTB:T206 Old Mill Revelle and Lipe Low Grade
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: WTB:T206 Old Mill Revelle and Lipe Low Grade
posts.post_content: Hello.Im looking to pick up examples of the cards listed in the title.I have the Piedmont Backs but would now like to pick up Old Mill copies.Low grade examples preferred but I can't see passing up a great deal on a better condition card if available.Contact me however is most convenient to you.Thank You.Jason Wells
It's been a few months ill try again.Thanks for any help.
